title: BSP-OT: Sparse transport plans between \ discrete measure in loglinear time.
authors: Baptiste Genest, Vincent Nivoliers, Nicolas Bonneel, David Coeurjolly
ot_definition: Given two point-sets $X,Y$ of $n$ points, what is the assignment $T$ that minimizes the transport cost?
ot_problem: \min_{T : X ightarrow Y} \sum_{x \in X} c(x, T(x))
